blog.name: yetanothercomicbook
blog.title: Comics
blog.description: Most of the comics I read are Marvels from 1984. Every time I read a comic, I post a comment. That's pretty much it.

title: Murder by Machine
body:
Spider-Man UK Annual 1981

Cute story. But nothing much is explained.

  • Villain Attacks Hero? Yup. It’s just an attack on Spider-Man. And the script doesn’t bother to tell us who or why.
  • Most of it is just Spidey trapped in a room easily avoiding/escaping three attempts to kill him.
  • The ending is cute, however, and does provoke a small chuckle.

5/10

blog.name: mikey-hunter
blog.title: Cia Appreciation Blog
blog.description: Full-time space filler, alleged writer. Big fan of Kamen Rider and Super Sentai. Now officially Kingdom Hearts Trash. My only-mostly dead Twitter: http://twitter.com/assholekagami

summary: The first game I ever Platinum’d was Kingdom Hearts 1 for the PS4. The second was Insomniac’s Spider-man, just now. Was real...
body:
The first game I ever Platinum’d was Kingdom Hearts 1 for the PS4. The second was Insomniac’s Spider-man, just now.

Was real easy. I checked my Trophy list when the game gave me the “hey you’re about to trigger the final boss fight” warning, and I was only missing three trophies. One was obviously going to be “finish the story,” so I looked up the other two. They were “do a thing I already did, but sometimes it doesn’t pop so do this specific thing and it should,” and “ground level secret I never would have thought to look for.”

Trophies I was dreading that turned out to not exist:

  • Complete all the side objectives in the replayable base assaults (Ugh.)
  • Fully upgrade all gadgets (The basic Web Shooters and Impact Webs were the only truly useful ones, not counting the story purposes for the Electric Webs)
  • Purchase all Suit Mods
  • Gold rank all Taskmaster challenges (I legit would have abandoned the Platinum if this one existed, the gulf between the silver threshold and the gold threshold is absurd. If you gold rank all of those, Sony should mail you a physical trophy.)
  • Achieve all milestones (No thanks, if I want to grind, I’ll play Disgaea)

Miscellaneous thoughts:

  • I can’t believe the ending Did That. Not gonna lie, I did tear up.
  • Could have done without the MJ or Miles stealth sections. Wouldn’t have minded more sections where you play as them and solve puzzles though.
  • The combat doesn’t really get less annoying. You get more tools to deal with it, but the game keeps trotting out more annoying enemy types to pester you. 
  • There are special enemy types who require two Focus bars to activate a finisher against. There’s an upgrade that gives you two finishers per Focus bar. This does not enable you to initiate finishers against those special enemy types with just one Focus bar at the cost of the second finisher. I feel that this is a mistake.
  • Still not really feeling MJ as the love interest. I would have gone with Felicia or Yuri.
  • Speaking of, I am fully prepared to be disappointed in how the writers portray Felicia in the DLC.

Was real easy. I checked my Trophy list when the game gave me the “hey you’re about to trigger the final boss fight” warning, and I was only missing three trophies. This does not enable you to initiate finishers against those special enemy types with just one Focus bar at the cost of the second finisher. I feel that this is a mistake.

The first game I ever Platinum’d was Kingdom Hearts 1 for the PS4. The second was Insomniac’s Spider-man, just now.

Was real easy. I checked my Trophy list when the game gave me the “hey you’re about to trigger the final boss fight” warning, and I was only missing three trophies. One was obviously going to be “finish the story,” so I looked up the other two. They were “do a thing I already did, but sometimes it doesn’t pop so do this specific thing and it should,” and “ground level secret I never would have thought to look for.”

Trophies I was dreading that turned out to not exist:

  • Complete all the side objectives in the replayable base assaults (Ugh.)
  • Fully upgrade all gadgets (The basic Web Shooters and Impact Webs were the only truly useful ones, not counting the story purposes for the Electric Webs)
  • Purchase all Suit Mods
  • Gold rank all Taskmaster challenges (I legit would have abandoned the Platinum if this one existed, the gulf between the silver threshold and the gold threshold is absurd. If you gold rank all of those, Sony should mail you a physical trophy.)
  • Achieve all milestones (No thanks, if I want to grind, I’ll play Disgaea)

Miscellaneous thoughts:

  • I can’t believe the ending Did That. Not gonna lie, I did tear up.
  • Could have done without the MJ or Miles stealth sections. Wouldn’t have minded more sections where you play as them and solve puzzles though.
  • The combat doesn’t really get less annoying. You get more tools to deal with it, but the game keeps trotting out more annoying enemy types to pester you. 
  • There are special enemy types who require two Focus bars to activate a finisher against. There’s an upgrade that gives you two finishers per Focus bar. This does not enable you to initiate finishers against those special enemy types with just one Focus bar at the cost of the second finisher. I feel that this is a mistake.

  • Speaking of, I am fully prepared to be disappointed in how the writers portray Felicia in the DLC.

blog.name: marvelzombiespromos
blog.title: Marvel Zombies Promos
blog.description:
This is the promo page for Marvel Zombies RP. For more information, please visit our main page.

The characters advertised are not an exclusive list, rather they are a short list of suggestions. Our intention is to maintain a rotor of characters from a variety of backgrounds. Please feel free to apply outside of the characters posted here.

summary: Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Miles Morales Requested by: Peter Parker Telephone networks have failed, the internet is...
caption:
Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Miles Morales
Requested by: Peter Parker

Telephone networks have failed, the internet is gone.  Modern communication seems to have come to an end.  What remains is radiowaves.  People with the right equipment have begun to communicate with anyone in range using CB radios, walkie talkies, whatever they can get their hands on.  Some are broadcasting, some are just listening.

As he tuned the radio through the various channels, looking for news, Miles heard the end of a series of coordinates.  As the static cleared, a familiar voice sounded, a voice he had not heard in over a year –

This is Peter Parker broadcasting for Miles Morales. I know you are a survivor so you are out there somewhere. This is no city, but its got video games, good people, strong walls and plenty to eat. Also hot showers are a thing here so yeah try to find your way here kid. Us spiders need to stick together.

Marvel Zombies RP is a Marvel Comics AU roleplay established 1 April 2017. We look forward to surviving with you.

Home || Plot || Rules || Taken/Open Characters || FAQ || Most Wanted

body:
Me playing Valkyr

Spider-Cat, Spider-Cat
